Sequence Information.Peptide Name: RI-16 (fragment of PMAP-36, synthetic AMPs, Lys-rich, Arg-rich, UCLL1c, XXA; BBMm)
Sequence Information.Source: sequence truncation, cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivatives

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (80%) toPMAP-36(1â€“20)K: 31%; R: 38%; L: 13%.Activity: active against E. coli (MIC 128 uM), S.typhimurium 7731 (MIC 128 uM), S.aureus 29213 (MIC 128 uM), S. epidermidis 12228 (MIC 32 uM), S.faecalis 29212 (MIC 128 uM).Structure: random coil in PBS and helical in 50% TFE or 30 mM SDS micelles.In vitro toxicity: human RBC, 5% hemolysis >256 uM, not hemo.lytic.MOA:bacteria:E. coli: permeated bacterial membranes.
Literature Information.Author: Zhu X, Dong N, Wang Z, Ma Z, Zhang L, Ma Q, Shan A.2014
Literature Information.Title: Design of imperfectly amphipathic alpha-helical antimicrobial peptides with enhanced cell selectivity.
